text: Maa Shakumbhari University is a state university in Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh. It was established by upgrading the Government Degree College, Punwarka that was established in 1999. All government and private degree colleges in the districts of Saharanpur, Muzaffarnagar, and Shamli are affiliated with Maa Shakumbhari University. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in India
title: Maa Shakumbhari University
